title: BRIEF-Clive Beddoe Acquires 10 Mln Shares, 10 Mln Warrants Of SQI Diagnostics
text:
BRIEF-Clive Beddoe Acquires 10 Mln Shares, 10 Mln Warrants Of SQI Diagnostics

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 25, 2019 18:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Clive Beddoe Acquires 10 Mln Shares, 10 Mln Warrants Of SQI Diagnostics Sept 25 (Reuters) - SQI Diagnostics Inc : * ACQUISITION OF UNITS OF SQI DIAGNOSTICS INC. * CLIVE J. BEDDOE - ACQUIRED BENEFICIAL OWNERSHIP OF 10 MILLION SHARES & 10 MILLION SHARE PURCHASE WARRANTS OF SQI DIAGNOSTICS

BRIEF-Clive Beddoe Acquires 10 Mln Shares, 10 Mln Warrants Of SQI Diagnostics
